abstract: State Senate confirms Lt Col George Beach as next superintendent of New York State Police.
lead_paragraph: Lt. Col. George Beach was picked by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo to succeed Joseph D’Amico, who announced his departure in April.

headline.main: Next Superintendent of New York State Police Is Confirmed
headline.print_headline: A 33-Year Veteran  of the State Police  Is Its New Leader

snippet: Lt. Col. George Beach was picked by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo to succeed Joseph D’Amico, who announced his departure in April.
